message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good start
I think a 60-40 split is fair, with me taking the larger share since I'm taking the risk of the decreasing value.
You took a risk, and it didn't pay off. My turn again
Let's stick with the 60-40 split.  I'm willing to be flexible but I need to get a good return on my investment.
You're losing value, I'm not. Time to adjust the split
We're both losing value at this rate.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
Even split? You're worth less than half now. I'll give you a 'generous' offer
I'm willing to compromise again, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's go back to the 60-40 split.  This is my last offer.
You said that was your last offer, but I'm not buying it. My turn again
